title: Modified Fisher Grading Scale for Subarachnoid Hemorrhage (SAH)
desc: The Modified Fisher Grading Scale rates severity of aneurysmal subarachnoid hemorrhage (aSAH) based on amount and type of blood on CT with vasospasm risk.

orgreference.text: Frontera JA, Claassen J, Schmidt JM, Wartenberg KE, Temes R, Connolly ES, Loch Macdonald R, Mayer SA. Prediction of symptomatic vasospasm after subarachnoid haemorrhage: the modified Fisher scale. Neurosurgery. 2006; 58(7): 21-27.
